articles.title: Elon Musk suffers early loss in bid to block OpenAI restructure - POLITICO
articles.description: The tech mogul, originally a founder of OpenAI, is now challenging the company’s conversion from a nonprofit to for-profit model.
articles.content: Musk launched the suit against OpenAI in August and expanded his case to add new claims and defendants in November, accusing the company of turning from a tax-exempt charity into a for-profit, market… [+1793 chars]

articles.title: Key ex-OpenAI researcher subpoenaed in AI copyright case - TechCrunch
articles.description: GPT architect Alec Radford has been subpoenaed in a copyright case against OpenAI, according to a court filing.
articles.content:
Alec Radford, a researcher who helped develop many of OpenAI’s key AI technologies, has been subpoenaed in a copyright case against the AI startup, according to a court filing Tuesday.

articles.title: Scientists Just Found a New Way to Search for Life on Mars - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists may finally have a way to detect ancient life on Mars by studying microbial fossils preserved in sulfate minerals. Gypsum deposits on Mars may be hiding evidence of past microbial life — similar to the first organisms that appeared on Earth four bi…
articles.content: A cutting-edge space instrument has detected microbial fossils in Earth’s gypsum — offering hope that Mars rovers could one day find the same. If traces of life exist in Martian sulfate rocks, we may… [+6570 chars]
